## Gene Details:

- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS SERINE/THREONINE KINASE 2, SNF1-related protein kinase 2.1

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_080084C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings screened in bulk via high throughput methods for responses to various stressors. Results  are in comparison to Col-0.heat:no change,cold:no change,oxidative stress:no change,osmotic stress:decreased,salt stress:decreased,ABA:no change,hypoxia:decreased.
